page.title: 10 The Kirkhill Gala
page.content: The Kirkhill Gala lasts for 9 days.It started on June 6th with a coffee evening. The next evening there was a disco for secondary school children. On Saturday there was a sponsored walk of 6 miles followed on Sunday by a Golf Tournament. On Monday there was a Whist Drive. On Tuesday there was a football tournament for the local school. Our school,Inchmore,won. On Thursday a barbeque had to be cancelled because of rain. The Ceilidh was on Friday, and included in its events were children from 3 local schools singing. Saturday the 15th was Gala Day. There were sports ,dancing,tug-of-war, pony rides, tombola etc. It concluded with a Barn Dance in Bunchrew.
